data.title: THE BREATH OF SUSPENSION
data.meta_description: Sauk City: Arkham House, 1994. First Edition & 1st printing . Octavo, original black cloth lettered in gold on spine panel, dark grey endpapers. 318 pp, Dust jacket and Interior illustrations by J.K. Potter. 3496 copies printed. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. Item #313150 ¶ Collects 10 stories. The author's first short story collection.
data.text:
Sauk City: Arkham House, 1994. First Edition (& 1st printing). Octavo, original black cloth lettered in gold on spine panel, dark grey endpapers. 318 pp, Dust jacket and Interior illustrations by J.K. Potter. 3496 copies printed. A fine copy in a fine dust jacket. Item #313150

¶ Collects 10 stories. The author's first short story collection.
